item.description:
Get ready to sharpen your language skills with a Word Game Night at Gulu-Gulu featuring games like:

Scrabble

Lexigon

Word on the Street

Boggle

Quiddler

Anomia

Snatch-It

So if you like any of these games or want to learn more about this genre, this event will be for you.  We welcome new players with open arms.

If you have never attended a Meetup at Gulu-Gulu before, we generally have our group spread out over a few tables, though we try to sit as close as possible. We like to start the evenings with a game that is easy to play while people are eating/arriving from work (like Quiddler). Afterward, we break into smaller groups/tables to play different games depending upon the group size and interest.        

Gulu-Gulu is accessible to most of downtown Salem. Parking can usually be found on Washington St., in the Church St. lot, and in the lot between Lynde and Essex Streets (by the YMCA). Gulu-Gulu has a great food and beverage menu that can be found at www.gulu-gulu.com. I do request that when we hold Meetups in food or drink establishments that everyone in attendance order at least one item or beverage.

*If there is a snow emergency, this event will be cancelled. Should it look like we'll receive snow that evening, we will be in contact via e-mail. Otherwise, you are always welcome to call to verify.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Word Games at Gulu-Gulu
